{{also|刺芹侧耳}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=刺芹侧耳|type=22}}

===Etymology===
[[刺芹]] (short for [[刺芹屬]]: the ''[[Eryngium]]'' [[genus]] of flowering plants, with whose roots the mushroom grows in association) + [[側耳]] (a reference to [[側耳屬]]: ''[[Pleurotus]]'' [[genus]])

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=cìqín cè'ěr
|cat=n
}}

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# [[king oyster mushroom]], a species of edible [[mushroom]] (species ''[[Pleurotus eryngii]]'')

====Synonyms====
* {{l|zh|刺芹菇}}
* {{l|zh|杏鮑菇}}
